name: Easy Instagram Carousels
description:
Have you ever thought about growing your Instagram influence, but don't know how to get started?


We created this simple carousel template to help reduce the time required for you to create beautiful looking content for your audience!


What do I get?

  • Sizes in both square (1:1) and portrait (4:5) format
  • 7 different colours for both dark and light themes
  • Easily customizable on Figma
  • 10 different post templates


How do I use it?

  • Duplicate file from Figma Community
  • Click on the âš¡ DESIGN HERE page
  • Select your preferred theme and template
  • Edit and post!
